data.title: The Story of My Name
data.meta_description: For this activity, students will interview family members about the story behind their names. Then they will present their findings as a project and/or speech. This is a fun back to school activity, as students are getting to know one another. Instead of simply asking students to introduce themselve...
data.text:
For this activity, students will interview family members about the story behind their names. Then they will present their findings as a project and/or speech. This is a fun back to school activity, as students are getting to know one another. Instead of simply asking students to introduce themselves, this activity takes it a step further, asking the question "What's in a Name?"

4 activity templates are included:

A creative poster project...

- with an area for the student's handwritten Name Story.

- with an area for the student's typed Name Story.

A questionnaire to help students write the story behind their names...

- to be presented to the class as a speech

- to be read and recorded on Vocaroo

Audio files from apps/sites like Vocaroo can be turned into QR codes for your bulletin board displays!

FONTS USED TO CREATE THIS PRODUCT:

PB Bean There Dunn That

PB Arrows

APL Type A Teacher

MJ Prettily Printed
